title: Inflation Rate
definition: Measures the rate at which the general level of prices for goods and services is rising, and subsequently, purchasing power is falling. The data represents headline inflation trends. Source: National Bank of Ethiopia (NBE) 2023/2024 Report.

title: Real GDP Growth
definition: Real Gross Domestic Product (GDP) growth measures the annual percentage change in the country's economic output, adjusted for inflation. Source: National Bank of Ethiopia (NBE) 2023/2024 Report.

title: Export Earnings
definition: The total value of goods and services exported from the country, indicating performance in international trade. Source: National Bank of Ethiopia (NBE) 2023/2024 Report.

title: Non-Performing Loan (NPL) Ratio
definition: The ratio of non-performing loans to total outstanding loans in the banking sector. A low ratio indicates a healthy financial system. Source: National Bank of Ethiopia (NBE) 2023/2024 Report.

title: Foreign Direct Investment (FDI)
definition: The net inflows of investment to acquire a lasting management interest in an enterprise operating in an economy other than that of the investor. Source: National Bank of Ethiopia (NBE) 2023/2024 Report.

title: Government Revenue
definition: Total government revenue from all sources, including tax and non-tax revenues. Source: National Bank of Ethiopia (NBE) 2023/2024 Report.
